articles.description: Merseyside Police say they're responding to reports of a car colliding with pedestrians on Water Street. It is not yet clear if anyone is injured.
articles.title: Liverpool parade live: Man detained after car driven into crowd

articles.description: England goalkeeper Mary Earps announces her retirement from international football with immediate effect.
articles.title: Mary Earps announces England retirement before Euro 2025

articles.description: Matheus Cunha's transfer to Manchester United is at an advanced stage as the Wolves forward nears a £62.5m move to Old Trafford.
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: Manchester United close to signing Wolves striker

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo suggests his Al-Nassr career is over in a cryptic social media post following their final game of the season.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo hints at Al-Nassr exit before Club World Cup

articles.description: A 53-year-old white British man has been arrested after dozens of people were hit by a car.
articles.title: What we know about the Liverpool FC parade incident

articles.description: Matti Schmid achieved his best ever PGA Tour finish on Sunday, but his putting technique is facing increasing scrutiny.
articles.title: Matti Schmid reignites broom-handle golf putter debate on PGA Tour - Iain Carter column

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions board is considering a proposal for golden point extra time if a deciding third Test this summer against Australia finishes in a draw.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Lions consider golden point extra time proposal

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC 5 live radio commentary from the French Open at Roland-Garros, the second Grand Slam tournament of the year.
articles.title: French Open 2025 LIVE: Norrie vs Medvedev - tennis scores, results, radio & order of play at Roland Garros

articles.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander leads the Oklahoma City Thunder past the Minnesota Timberwolves to move them within one win of the NBA Finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander puts Oklahoma City Thunder on brink of Finals

articles.description: Victoria Azarenka speeds into the second round of the French Open with a rapid 48-minute 'double bagel' victory over Yanina Wickmayer.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Victoria Azarenka races into second round with 48-minute 6-0 6-0 win
